description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet ecosystems. His work explores concepts like digital fragmentation, ecosystem architecture, and innovative approaches to global challenges. yeehaa's blog posts and courses cover topics ranging from internet culture and philosophy to practical innovation and breaking down organizational silos, reflecting his diverse interests and interdisciplinary approach.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, combines tech and philosophy to innovate in education and knowledge sharing. Based in Taipei, he explores digital fragmentation, ecosystem design, and fosters inclusive internet communities through diverse projects and writings.
